mapper.select: SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_CD_NM , CODE_LEVEL , DISP_SEQ , COMMENT , USE_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID FROM TF_COMM_CODE WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY DISP_SEQ ASC , COMM_CD ASC
SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_CD_NM , CODE_LEVEL , DISP_SEQ , COMMENT , USE_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID FROM TF_COMM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_LEVEL = 'B' ORDER BY COMM_CD asc

SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_CD_NM , CODE_LEVEL , DISP_SEQ , COMMENT , USE_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID FROM TF_COMM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(COMM_CD,1,2) = #{item} AND CODE_LEVEL = 'M' ORDER BY COMM_CD ASC

SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_CD_NM , CODE_LEVEL , DISP_SEQ , COMMENT , USE_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID FROM TF_COMM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(COMM_CD,1,4) = #{item} AND CODE_LEVEL = 'S' ORDER BY COMM_CD ASC

SELECT COMM_CD , COMM_CD_NM , CODE_LEVEL , DISP_SEQ , COMMENT , USE_YN , REG_DATE , REG_ID , MOD_DATE , MOD_ID FROM TF_COMM_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND SUBSTR(COMM_CD, 1, 2) = #{item} AND ( CODE_LEVEL = 'M' OR CODE_LEVEL = 'S' ) ORDER BY COMM_CD ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TF_COMM_CODE (COMM_CD, COMM_CD_NM, CODE_LEVEL, DISP_SEQ, COMMENT, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE) VALUES( #{commCd}, #{commCdNm}, #{codeLevel}, #{dispSeq}, #{comment}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE TF_COMM_CODE SET USE_YN = 'N' WHERE COMM_CD = #{commCd}
